[console_scripts]
cevolve_download_genomes = cazomevolve.genomes.download_genomes:main
cevolve_extract_proteins = cazomevolve.genomes.extract_prot_seqs:main

cvolve_invoke_dbcan3 = cazomevolve.cazome.dbcan.invoke_dbcan_3:main
